pricingTable.heading: Pricing Options and Add Ons
pricingTable.disclaimer: All prices are listed in either USD or MXN as indicated. If payment is made in a different currency than the one listed, for example paying in pesos for a USD listed price or vice versa, the final price will be calculated using Mave Medical Spa’s current internal exchange rate at the time of payment.
